questions.question: What about the reads from CARDDEMO-COMMAREA of fields CDEMO-PGM-REENTER (line 95) and CDEMO-FROM-PROGRAM (line 113) in data_flow.reads_from? Currently only CDEMO-CU02-USR-SELECTED is listed with citations [94,99].

data_flow.writes_to lacks an entry for CARDDEMO-COMMAREA despite updates to CDEMO-FROM-TRANID (line 255), CDEMO-FROM-PROGRAM (line 256), and CDEMO-PGM-CONTEXT (line 258) before XCTL (259) or RETURN (135).

Line 252 checks CDEMO-TO-PROGRAM = LOW-VALUES OR SPACES in RETURN-TO-PREV-SCREEN, but this field read from CARDDEMO-COMMAREA (via line 94) is not listed in data_flow.reads_from fields_used for CARDDEMO-COMMAREA.
What about the transform from CDEMO-CU02-USR-SELECTED to USRIDINI OF COUSR2AI (line 101)? It is a key data flow for initial loading but not documented in data_flow.transforms.
